What to Know About the Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute Application Form Portal

The Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute SNTI Application portal is designed to accept application of candidates seeking for admission into the University. In the portal, applicant can Purchase application form, Track and monitor application status, pay fees, Print Acknowledgement Slip, check admission list, etc.

Who is Eligible to Apply for Admission

To be eligible for admission in the SNTI application portal, candidates must;

  • Have Secondary School Leaving Certificate
  • Meet National Senior Certificate (NSC) requirement for admission into Higher Certificate
  • Grade 12 certificate applicant is of added advantage
  • Must write the NBTs for admission to SNTI on/before 15 October 2024.
  • FPS of 480 or above.
  • NBT scores of Upper
  • Intermediate for AL & QL
  • Mathematics 60%
  • English HL 50%
  • English FAL 60%

How to Apply | SNTI Application Form 2024

Eligible candidates can click here to apply.

Follow the steps below

  • Visit Application portal
  • Choose type of Application (Undergraduate, Post Graduate, Semester Studies)
  • Fill and complete all necessary pages
  • Pay Application fees where required

The Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute Admission Requirements … All Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute Prospective Students who wish to study in any faculty that Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute offers is expected to check the Minimum Entry Requirements for courses.

The Management of the Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute has stated that all Applicants are to take notes of these Admission Requirements before Applying for Admission.

Sizanesu Nursing Training Institute Application Required Documents

To apply to SNTI you need to submit the following documentation:

  • A completed application form
  • A copy of your results for the latest school year
  • A copy of your ID
  • If you have attended another higher education institution, we need a copy of your academic transcript
